topics.description: The Town Clerks will help you with obtaining birth and death certificates, how to register a new business, registering your dog, or how to request a marriage license. Sportsmen and women can fill out hunting and fishing licenses, and those over 18 can register to vote. You'll find the forms and phone numbers you need to do all that and more below.
